thread.section_title: Auto Europe Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Europe Canada | autoeurope.ca
thread.title: Long term customer
thread.title_full: Auto Europe Canada reviewed by Long term customer

author: Long term customer
title: Long term customer
text: I've been stuck at the Airport early in the morning with poor Staff giving me a hard time, when you are stuck in a foreign city you will be glad you have Auto Europe backing you up with a single call. Their customer service rep fixed all my problems in 5 minutes . the look on the airport staff faces when i took my cell phone and said "they want to talk to you" was priceless!
